definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: Corexit 9500 was found to be one of the most toxic dispersal agents ever developed.
sentences.chinese: 被發現是有史以來生產的最具毒性的分散劑之一。

sentences.english: Unique peace and quiet dispersant and antioxidant.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的清淨分散劑和抗氧化劑。

sentences.english: The experiment shows that PAMPS is a kind of fine dispersion and scale inhibitor.
sentences.chinese: 這說明PAMPS是一種優良的阻垢分散劑。

sentences.english: Solubilization is an important property of dispersion agent.
sentences.chinese: 增溶作用是分散劑的一個重要性質。

sentences.english: Aim To establish a method for the determination of ketoconazole in compound ketoconazole powder.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立酮康唑的外用複方散劑的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Disperse additive is advantageous to transparence .
sentences.chinese: 分散劑有利於透明改性。

sentences.english: Usually, HEDP is used together with polycarboxylic acid.
sentences.chinese: 通常與聚羧酸型阻垢分散劑配合使用。

sentences.english: To improving the gasohol's stability, dispersant was added.
sentences.chinese: 通過加入分散劑的方法改善乙醇汽油的穩定性。

sentences.english: The type of dispersant mainly influence the surface structure characteristic of coal particle.
sentences.chinese: 分散劑的種類主要影響到改性煤粒表面的結構特徵。

sentences.english: The dispersivity of carbon fibers was closely related to the category and mass fraction of dispersants.
sentences.chinese: 短碳纖維的分散性與分散劑的種類和質量分數有關。

sentences.english: The effect of dispersant on the preparation of HMX by impinging method was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了分散劑在撞擊法制備超細HMX中的作用。

sentences.english: Dye dispersant was synthesized using kraft lignin as raw material.
sentences.chinese: 以松木硫酸鹽木質素爲原料合成染料分散劑。

sentences.english: Adding a proper amount of calcium-containing detergent can increase the hydrolytic and thermal stabilities of the fluid.
sentences.chinese: 適量的鈣鹽清淨分散劑可提高水解安定性和熱穩定性。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT Objective To establish an HPLC method for the determination of azithromycin powder.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立HPLC法測定阿奇黴素散劑的含量。

sentences.english: The modifier is chemically configured to improve the efficacy of the naphthalene sulfonate dispersant.
sentences.chinese: 所述改性劑在化學上認爲可改善萘磺酸鹽分散劑效力。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of anti-influenza virus of Shengjiang powder.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察升降散散劑的抗流感病毒作用。
